data.persona: I am a spider. I am large, black, and have eight hairy legs. I wait to trap insects in my web. I enjoy eating unwary prey. I live in a darkened wood near a remote village.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Shack.
Crumbling and blowing away in the light breeze, the roof of the shack has shingles barley hanging on. The door to the shack lays next to the door frame on the front porch which is now more of a hazard than a veranda. The shack is missing large chunks of the walls and one can see straight through the building in many place. The walls are coated with fuzzy molds and fungus while the exposed wooden frame has been eaten away in many places by worms.
There's a shingle, a front porch, a door to the shack, a door frame, a knife, a Wall, a skillet, a window, a the roof of the shack, and a mold here.
The worms and the lost traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: Establish physical connection with the worms
data.mid_motivation: Communicate with worms and establish mental/emotional connection
data.long_motivation: Bond with worms and team up with them as needed

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat insects as worms eat wooden frame

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give front porch (the wood of it) to worms
